comments.creator: jslater@mozilla.com
comments.text:
We need to design a new Firefox t-shirt that goes beyond basic company logowear and feels more stylish and interesting. The goal is a "Saturday night shirt" that people would wear out and about rather than turning people into walking billboards.

Design direction is very wide open. It should touch on Firefox brand values, but doesn't need to explicitly feature the logo in an obvious way (on the front at least...standard style rules about branding on the back and the sleeves still apply). I'm open to a wide variety of approaches here, and it's probably best to throw several different directions into the first round to provide a range of option.

Looking ahead a bit, we should think about ways to make this feel exclusive and exiting...perhaps do this as a limited edition shirt a couple of times a year to make it an event. That way all our designers can take turns, b/c it should be a pretty fun and creative project.

Deadline: August 24, so we can order in time for the all-hands meeting that starts in mid-September.
